resources.string: The following modules are provided as additional dependencies, and are not a part of the core library. If you\'ve made a module you want to see included, let us know!
Elastic scrolling view - scroll past bounds to dismiss.
Watch tag %1$s on logcat for a demo.
Rotate your device for a two pane view.

Sem dolor amet sed hymenaeos tempor. Cras felis.
